entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.7°C

Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 3:00 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023

Temperature: 0.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 77 %

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h late this afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Monday 13 March 2023
